phrases: They are going at a fast pace.
Sorry I could not make the start.
Is not Shindo waiting too long?
I think it would be easier if he ran ahead.
He tends to match the pace of the people around him.
It is exhausting trying to match someone else's pace.
I hope he does not pay for it later.
Their pace changed once they swapped places.
It is what they intended all along.
Yuki sets the pace for the first half.
And Shindo pulls Yuki during the second.
They planned their course knowing they would get lapped.
He is taking on the exchange students.
He is not insolent for nothing.
Get off me, it is hot!
Kansei University is an interesting team.
I heard about you from Rikudo's Fujioka.
You are hoping to run at Hakone?
It seems you still have members who have not achieved the requisite official record.
Finishing in that time around this time of year as a first-year is astounding.
Are you Kurahara of Sendai Josei High School?
Hey, he asked you a question.
I will be back to interview you properly.
I am Mochizuki of Shinjitsu Weekly magazine.
I would rather have air conditioning than noodles...
Quit complaining and bring me a shiso leaf.
I thought I would be glad the rainy season was over.
Apparently, this is the hottest summer in recorded history.
I am amazed we are not dead.
If you do not eat, you really will die during evening practice.
The pair that never fails a class.
We are destined to end up on Nico-chan Senpai's side of life.
We have been eating nothing but somen lately.
It is too hot to think.
I wish we could go someplace cool, like Hokkaido.
We are escaping from this scorching hell.
Why did you choose the mountains?
The owner of the batting cage in the shopping center
said we could borrow their villa.
And the people at the shopping center provided us with groceries.
Why does this guy get a seat when I have to sit in the back?
You are the one who lost rock-paper-scissors.
I am excited about the lake.
Even the breeze is starting to feel moist.
But I am supposed to be the coach...p
Could we wash ourselves off in the river first?
It is cold once the sun goes down.
All that is left is to mix in the roux.
All that is left is to mix it in?
Then quit putting on airs and mix it in already.
We are going for a run before dinner.
I do not mind having a soup of potatoes and carrots boiled in plain old water.
You can really enjoy the flavors of the ingredients.
And of course, I am the only one who knows where the roux is.
You do not want to get attacked by a bear at night.
Head down the hill, and you will reach the lake.
You can return to the villa once you have completed three laps.
Shinanoji Footpath Yashigamine Tateshina Lake Nagano Prefecture Chino City
Are you Kurahara of Sendai Josei High School?
Glutamine, vitamin B group, minerals (Ca, Mg, Fe)
100 whey protein for building an athlete's body
What are you doing with that?
But you said it was cliche.
I am telling you, do not do it!
Just how much are you going to eat?
That is not what I meant.
I meant, is not someone missing?
Maybe we should not be wandering around.
What if they have fallen into a ravine and gotten stuck?
Do you think they have their phones?
Even if they do, they will not have any bars.
Let us split into two groups.
Some of us will stay here, and the rest of us will use the van to look for them.
Why do you all want to stay?
He easily climbs up steep mountainsides and uses the stars to find his way.
I am honestly mystified you are not injured.
We found a path on the edge of the lake.
We thought it would be perfect for cross country running,
but once we followed it, we got lost...
I am glad you are all right,
but if this were Hakone, you would be disqualified for leaving the course.
Is not there a lead car?
Apparently, Tokyo Sport Uni is here, too.
We were drawn out of the bushes towards the light.
I would recognize that marbling anywhere.
That was Japanese black wagyu beef!
There is no meat in this.
I cannot believe we ran into them.
It is like they are a real track team.
We are a real track team, too.
It is difficult to run like this.
Are not they spreading out more than necessary?
Hey, do not do anything stupid.
Then why are we holding this training camp?
I told everyone to maintain their own pace.
No one has that much energy in the morning.
I am worried about him going off on his own.
It makes me happy just to breathe.
We are not getting the way.
They are just picking a fight.
We still have training left to finish.
I am not going to talk to your coaches.
I would just be happy to have your understanding.
We do not have time for pleb teams.
You will be the center of attention if you run.
People will talk about you if you say you want to run.
I am talking about plebs who set unrealistic goals
on the basis of such shallow thinking.
Just us first-years, ten against ten.
Then you will see what it means to be serious.
I am the only one who needs to.
They have nothing to do with this.
That is how you break a team.
You do not feel bad about it, do you?
And you forget about the sacrifices other people made.
There is not much to gain from racing against children.
Are you satisfied running with the friends you finally made?
Are you satisfied holding hands and running around with your little friends?!
